speaker: Agent
text: Hello, this is Mark from XYZ Collections. Am I speaking with Jessica?

speaker: Customer
text: No, this is not Jessica. You have the wrong number.

speaker: Agent
text: I apologize for the mix-up. I'm calling about an outstanding balance with your account.

speaker: Customer
text: I really think you need to check your records. I have no account with you.

speaker: Agent
text: I'm very sorry for the inconvenience. I'll make sure to update our records.

speaker: Agent
text: Of course! Thank you for your patience. Have a great day!
